channel.title: Run.bat [resolved]
channel.description:
it's been a long time since i have made a server so i forgot most things and i am getting an error saying "the system cannot find the path specified" i changed the java version, but that didn't work.
what do i do?
i am leeching uncalled attack because i can't fully code a server yet and i forgot some of what i know, so ye...
here is the code for the run.bat file:
[code]@echo off title Uncalled Attack [ECO] "C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.6.0_26/bin/java" -Xmx900m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code]

item.title: Run.bat [resolved]
item.dc:creator: @FuZzIoN FuZzIoN
item.description:
@FuZzIoN wrote:

This code works for me but i’m not sure if it works for you.

So select “run.bat” or whatever file you have to run server and press “edit” then copy and paste the code below

@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-
nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
start Run-Server.bat
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat [resolved]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

Set the path to your JDK,

c:/Program Files(x86)/Java/

Your version might be different, just replace the existing one with your current version/path.

Read full topic
